column4: so whats up with ubuntu.com saying 7.04 will be out tomorrow, when tomorrow is today?
Its not today for me.. Wait for the timezones to catch up. *Is impatient for release too*
Last time the release came around the afternoon for me in the UK...
if it is UTC as Juhaz says then its the 19th in just under 8 hours time, if it released at midnight
